project_abstract.cdata: The purpose of the project is to support the Government in implementing its policies on the conservation of wildlife resources and development of tourist attractions by providing finance for the following: (i) facilities to increase the tourist capacity and local development impacts of the Amboseli National Park, the Masai Mara National Reserve, and the Reserves of the Inner Northern Circuit comprising Samburu National Reserve, Buffalo Springs National Reserve, Shaba National Reserve, and the Marmar Ranch; (ii) improvements at Lake Turkana (formerly Lake Rudolf) National Park; (iii) game-proof barriers; (iv) a Wildlife and Fisheries Training Institute; (v) buses for the Wildlife Clubs of Kenya; (vi) a Wildlife Planning Unit; (vii) policy and feasibility studies on wildlife and tourism development; (viii) support for anti-poaching activities; and (ix) project management.
